alfredsnippet.snippet:
1. seaborn factorplot is deprecated
From:  sns.factorplot("sex", data=df);
To: sns.catplot("sex",data=df,kind="count")

2. basemap not found
# install high resolution basemap
conda install -n dataSc -c conda-forge basemap-data-hires

3.  plotly cufflinks problem
pip install git+git://github.com/santosjorge/cufflinks.git#egg=cufflinks -U
alfredsnippet.name: troubleshoot
